snippet: The third-tier English club, which rebounded from a fatal stadium fire that killed 56 three decades ago, keeps on advancing in the F.A. Cup.
lead_paragraph: The third-tier English club, which rebounded from a fatal stadium fire that killed 56 three decades ago, keeps on advancing in the F.A. Cup.

headline.main: Bradford City Making Another Magical Run
headline.print_headline: Bradford City Making Another Magical Run
